Shadowed by her parents' divorce, Xi eventually breaks up with Zhong. Meanwhile, Mei regains her confidence and charm. programme.title: OMG, Your Honour
programme.desc: FAN SIU-YUE (Ben Wong) and YOUNG LIK-WANG (Eddie Kwan) are well-known barristers for criminal cases. Even though they have known each other for 30 years, they became enemies since the first day in law school. During their first court case after graduation, SIU-YUE suspects that LIK-WANG has won the case by playing tricks and they hate each other even more. SIU-YUE meets the TV anchor MOK HEI-LOI (Grace Wong) after losing his love. They get married swiftly but they separate after a few months. HEI-LOI meets LIK-WANG by chance and they get along really well. The love triangle has further worsened the relationship between SIU-YUE and LIK-WANG. On the contrary, their pupils have become friends but a lawyer's life is not as good as what they think. Together with their two masters, the six pupils HA SUM-NING (Louisa Mak), CHIU KAM-SHUI (Oscar Leung), TUNG TAN-KIU (Jonathan Wong), TANG TAI-CHI (Jackson Lai), WONG TUNG (Kirby Lam) and PO CHUNG-HIM (King Lam) work hard to uphold law and justice while developing their skills and potentials stumblingly...

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice
programme.desc: Because of some transfer arrangement and several complicated cases, AICIP Au Yeung Chung (Bobby Au Yeung) and CUSP Tsui Hay-yi (Joey Meng) become collaborating partners. The duo have mutual understanding. Sheung Siu (Jeannie Chan), daughter of a logistics company boss, hates Au Yeung Chung as she is certain that he has caused her family to break up. Au Yeung Chung had promised the late Mrs. Sheung he would be tolerant of Sheung Siu. But he realizes Sheung Siu has hooked up with lawyer Tai Ching-kwan (Joe Ma) and gang boss Tai Ching-yan (Pierre Ngo). He also finds out his colleague and also buddy Chun Wing-hei (Mat Yeung) used to go out with Sheung Siu. The duo keep a close watch on the Tai brothers as they want to get her back on the straight and narrow. Au Yeung Chung and Ching-kwan have different values. Also, they each have their own interpretation of justice. A battle of wits is quietly triggered when these two guys run into each other.

Au Yeung Chung had promised the late Mrs. Sheung he would be tolerant of Sheung Siu. But he realizes Sheung Siu has hooked up with lawyer Tai Ching-kwan (Joe Ma) and gang boss Tai Ching-yan (Pierre Ngo). He also finds out his colleague and also buddy Chun Wing-hei (Mat Yeung) used to go out with Sheung Siu. The duo keep a close watch on the Tai brothers as they want to get her back on the straight and narrow. Au Yeung Chung and Ching-kwan have different values. programme.title: TB & What's On Today
programme.desc: The "Journey to Guilin" series heads north again to uncover more information on food, shopping, and entertainment. This time, Nancy Sit teams up with Matthew Ho and Brian Lam to explore Guilin in Guangxi, a place renowned for its breathtaking landscapes. Together, they gather travel tips that combine unique landforms, stunning scenery, and delicious local cuisine. The group visits famous attractions such as Elephant Trunk Hill, the Li River, and Longji Rice Terraces. They take a cable car up Yao Mountain and venture into ancient underground caves to experience the "three wonders" of Guilin: lush mountains, clear waters, and mysterious caves. The team enjoys a variety of local delicacies and experiences in Guilin, tasting Guangxi oil tea, rice noodles, Lipu taro, the "Osmanthus Banquet," and the "Kumquat Banquet," among other authentic flavors. They also try on traditional ethnic costumes to immerse themselves in the local culture.

programme.title: The Defected
programme.desc: Inspector Sheung-bang of the Crime Squad was once a rising star in the police force. While trying to save a colleague, he was shot by a gangster, his life forever changed. After his miraculous survival, Sheung-bang pursues his case with even greater resolve, earning him the nickname "Iron Detective," though he constantly suffers from the aftereffects. Chief Superintendent Wan Hei-wah, ambitious and poised to become the force's first "Top Lady," is shot and wounded by none other than Hei-wah's undercover agent, Yau Ping-ko. Bing-ko, driven by his unwavering resolve, is surprised when Hei-wah breaks his promise. In a fit of rage, Bing-ko accidentally injures Sheung-bang, a move filled with remorse and a secretive effort to help Sheung-bang solve the case as compensation. A power struggle turns Sheung-bang and Bing-ko into pawns, but thanks to the help of Chief Superintendent Cheng Yu-sum, he vows to put an end to the power struggle!

programme.title: News Treasury 2024
programme.desc: As the saying goes, "Today's news is tomorrow's history." With so much news every day, it's hard for everyone to take it all in, let alone look back at history. History is a treasure troveâ€”if we ignore or underestimate it, we might miss out on its riches. The new program "News Treasure Hunt" guides viewers to uncover news gems from this vault. In addition to special features, live broadcasts, and series reports from the past, the show offers never-before-seen precious footage. Audiences will have the chance to revisit events such as Bruce Lee's funeral, the Bank of Po Sang robbery, the Gang of Four trial, the Queen's visit to Hong Kong, taxi strikes, the signing of the Sino-British Joint Declaration, an exclusive interview with Margaret Thatcher, Vietnamese refugees, the death of Governor Youde, Chris Patten's arrival in Hong Kong, the closure of Kai Tak Airport, the passing of Deng Xiaoping, the 1997 Handover Ceremony, the China Airlines Hong Kong crash, and SARS press conferences.

programme.title: Homeland Guardian
programme.desc: Hong Kong police officer Ho Ho-fai, together with his mentor Huo Qiquan and junior Chen Yaoyang, have solved numerous major cases, earning the nickname "The Three Tigers of O Division." However, during a raid to capture the ruthless criminal Zhou Xiong, they suffer a crushing defeatâ€”Huo Qiquan is killed, Zhou Xiong escapes, and a video of Ho Ho-fai kneeling to Zhou Xiong in an attempt to save his mentor goes viral online. Due to this incident, O Division's senior official Shao Feng's promotion is delayed, and overnight, Ho Ho-fai becomes the disgrace of the police force. Nevertheless, he does not give up and is determined to uncover the truth and avenge his mentor. At this time, his wife Cai Zhuoxin, who has been separated from him for a year, returns to Hong Kong from Canada with their son. Ho Ho-fai tries hard to win her back, but Cai Zhuoxin remains indifferent. Just as Ho Ho-fai suspected, Zhou Xiong's mastermindâ€”Louis from the EGM Fund in the United Statesâ€”is plotting an unprecedented financial attack on Hong Kong, aiming to disrupt the prosperity and stability of the international financial center. His evil plan is accidentally discovered by American hacker Gordon and Gordon's girlfriend Li Ke'er. To protect her hometown of Hong Kong, Li Ke'er mails a USB drive containing the EGM financial attack plan to Hong Kong, but is killed for her actions. Gordon rushes to Hong Kong to find the USB drive, while Louis sends his subordinate Anna to hunt him down.

programme.title: The Defected
programme.desc: Inspector Sheung-bang of the Crime Squad was once a rising star in the police force. While trying to save a colleague, he was shot by a gangster, his life forever changed. After his miraculous survival, Sheung-bang pursues his case with even greater resolve, earning him the nickname "Iron Detective," though he constantly suffers from the aftereffects. Chief Superintendent Wan Hei-wah, ambitious and poised to become the force's first "Top Lady," is shot and wounded by none other than Hei-wah's undercover agent, Yau Ping-ko. Bing-ko, driven by his unwavering resolve, is surprised when Hei-wah breaks his promise. In a fit of rage, Bing-ko accidentally injures Sheung-bang, a move filled with remorse and a secretive effort to help Sheung-bang solve the case as compensation. A power struggle turns Sheung-bang and Bing-ko into pawns, but thanks to the help of Chief Superintendent Cheng Yu-sum, he vows to put an end to the power struggle!

Shadowed by her parents' divorce, Xi eventually breaks up with Zhong. Meanwhile, Mei regains her confidence and charm. Zhong begins to admire Mei, but Mei has already joined her good friend Hao (Louis Koo). Youngest daughter Tung (Lam Chi-kwan), a bright and clever girl, marries the promising young man Tung (Wong Kai-tak). programme.desc: Because of some transfer arrangement and several complicated cases, AICIP Au Yeung Chung (Bobby Au Yeung) and CUSP Tsui Hay-yi (Joey Meng) become collaborating partners. The duo have mutual understanding. Sheung Siu (Jeannie Chan), daughter of a logistics company boss, hates Au Yeung Chung as she is certain that he has caused her family to break up. Au Yeung Chung had promised the late Mrs. Sheung he would be tolerant of Sheung Siu. But he realizes Sheung Siu has hooked up with lawyer Tai Ching-kwan (Joe Ma) and gang boss Tai Ching-yan (Pierre Ngo). He also finds out his colleague and also buddy Chun Wing-hei (Mat Yeung) used to go out with Sheung Siu. The duo keep a close watch on the Tai brothers as they want to get her back on the straight and narrow. Au Yeung Chung and Ching-kwan have different values. Also, they each have their own interpretation of justice. A battle of wits is quietly triggered when these two guys run into each other.

programme.title: Journey to Guilin
programme.desc: The "Journey to Guilin" series heads north again to uncover more information on food, shopping, and entertainment. This time, Nancy Sit teams up with Matthew Ho and Brian Lam to explore Guilin in Guangxi, a place renowned for its breathtaking landscapes. Together, they gather travel tips that combine unique landforms, stunning scenery, and delicious local cuisine. The group visits famous attractions such as Elephant Trunk Hill, the Li River, and Longji Rice Terraces. They take a cable car up Yao Mountain and venture into ancient underground caves to experience the "three wonders" of Guilin: lush mountains, clear waters, and mysterious caves. The team enjoys a variety of local delicacies and experiences in Guilin, tasting Guangxi oil tea, rice noodles, Lipu taro, the "Osmanthus Banquet," and the "Kumquat Banquet," among other authentic flavors. They also try on traditional ethnic costumes to immerse themselves in the local culture.

Semasa berada di sana, Black terimbas kembali masa lalu Malik, satu fenomena yang membingungkannya. Pemergian mereka ini juga merupakan titik perubahan cara Sofia melihat keupayaannya. Kesanggupan Sofia menggadaikan nyawanya untuk menyelamatkan nyawa orang lain memperbaharui tanggapan Black terhadapnya. Adakah cinta mula berputik? Tetapi hari yang bersinar menjadi pudar apabila Black kembali ke rumah dan mendapati bilik tersembunyi Malik telah digeledah dan dikosongkan. After his miraculous survival, Sheung-bang pursues his case with even greater resolve, earning him the nickname "Iron Detective," though he constantly suffers from the aftereffects. Chief Superintendent Wan Hei-wah, ambitious and poised to become the force's first "Top Lady," is shot and wounded by none other than Hei-wah's undercover agent, Yau Ping-ko. Bing-ko, driven by his unwavering resolve, is surprised when Hei-wah breaks his promise. In a fit of rage, Bing-ko accidentally injures Sheung-bang, a move filled with remorse and a secretive effort to help Sheung-bang solve the case as compensation. A power struggle turns Sheung-bang and Bing-ko into pawns, but thanks to the help of Chief Superintendent Cheng Yu-sum, he vows to put an end to the power struggle!

programme.title: Roadside Station Guide XIII
programme.desc: Japan has over a thousand â€œMichi-no-Ekiâ€� (roadside stations), providing drivers with convenient rest stops along their journeys. These stations are also gateways for exploring the unique characteristics of nearby areas, offering opportunities to discover local specialties, cuisine, and cultural surprises. Wong Yau-nam and Leung Wan-yu set out on a self-driving tour, visiting thirteen distinctive Michi-no-Eki in the Kanto region and traveling along the â€œRomantic Roadâ€� that connects places like Tochigi and Gunma Prefectures, embarking on a new kind of travel experience. After stopping at a rest area known as a hidden â€œdessert paradise,â€� they ventured into orchards to pick and eat seasonal fruits on the spot, and sampled photogenic wagashi (Japanese confections) and fruit-flavored shaved ice. They also explored a rest stop featuring a collection of Mashiko pottery, enjoyed the ambiance of a Mashiko ware teahouse, and visited a sake brewery to savor local sake.

Chief Superintendent Wan Hei-wah, ambitious and poised to become the force's first "Top Lady," is shot and wounded by none other than Hei-wah's undercover agent, Yau Ping-ko. Bing-ko, driven by his unwavering resolve, is surprised when Hei-wah breaks his promise. In a fit of rage, Bing-ko accidentally injures Sheung-bang, a move filled with remorse and a secretive effort to help Sheung-bang solve the case as compensation. A power struggle turns Sheung-bang and Bing-ko into pawns, but thanks to the help of Chief Superintendent Cheng Yu-sum, he vows to put an end to the power struggle!

programme.title: Syawal Mencari Cinta
programme.desc: Pada pagi Raya, Syawal melepak bersama rakannya dan mereka tidak menunaikan solat sunat Hari Raya. Setelah selesai solat sunat Hari Raya, dia ternampak seorang gadis yang tidak pernah dilihatnya di kampung sebelum ini. Syawal terus berkesimpulan bahawa dia telah menemui cinta sejati. Dia telah mengunjung setiap rumah di kampung untuk menjejaki gadis tersebut. Selepas sekian lama mencari tanpa membuahkan hasil, Syawal terus mengumumkan kepada seluruh kampung bahawa dia akan melaksanakan rumah terbuka untuk hari raya dan semua orang dijemput hadir ke rumahnya. Namun demikian, setelah selesai rumah terbukanya, gadis yang dicari-cari Syawal masih tidak kelihatan. Dia kecewa lalu berputus asa. Tanpa sedar, gadis yang dijejaki selama ini adalah Cinta, sepupunya sendiri.

programme.title: Gods Of Honour
programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a 'Fire master' in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHING's third son. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager. When he meets his parents again, he denies them three times. He even returns his flesh to his father and bones to his mother. Although he is resurrected again, he becomes a 'Vegetable'. Arrogant NAR JAR turns into a dummy. Meanwhile, Shang Dynasty emperor ZHOU (CHENG TSE SHING, TIMOTHY) abandons his empire for his mistress TANGIE (WAN PIK HAR, IRENE) and puts the empire in jeopardy. NAR JAR pulls himself together again under his mother and friends' help and fights against ZHOU's army for the civilians.

However, during a raid to capture the ruthless criminal Zhou Xiong, they suffer a crushing defeatâ€”Huo Qiquan is killed, Zhou Xiong escapes, and a video of Ho Ho-fai kneeling to Zhou Xiong in an attempt to save his mentor goes viral online. Due to this incident, O Division's senior official Shao Feng's promotion is delayed, and overnight, Ho Ho-fai becomes the disgrace of the police force. Nevertheless, he does not give up and is determined to uncover the truth and avenge his mentor. At this time, his wife Cai Zhuoxin, who has been separated from him for a year, returns to Hong Kong from Canada with their son. Ho Ho-fai tries hard to win her back, but Cai Zhuoxin remains indifferent. Just as Ho Ho-fai suspected, Zhou Xiong's mastermindâ€”Louis from the EGM Fund in the United Statesâ€”is plotting an unprecedented financial attack on Hong Kong, aiming to disrupt the prosperity and stability of the international financial center. His evil plan is accidentally discovered by American hacker Gordon and Gordon's girlfriend Li Ke'er. To protect her hometown of Hong Kong, Li Ke'er mails a USB drive containing the EGM financial attack plan to Hong Kong, but is killed for her actions. programme.title: Gods Of Honour

He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager. When he meets his parents again, he denies them three times. He even returns his flesh to his father and bones to his mother. Although he is resurrected again, he becomes a 'Vegetable'. Arrogant NAR JAR turns into a dummy. Meanwhile, Shang Dynasty emperor ZHOU (CHENG TSE SHING, TIMOTHY) abandons his empire for his mistress TANGIE (WAN PIK HAR, IRENE) and puts the empire in jeopardy. NAR JAR pulls himself together again under his mother and friends' help and fights against ZHOU's army for the civilians.

programme.title: Homeland Guardian & What's On Today
programme.desc: Hong Kong police officer Ho Ho-fai, together with his mentor Huo Qiquan and junior Chen Yaoyang, have solved numerous major cases, earning the nickname "The Three Tigers of O Division." However, during a raid to capture the ruthless criminal Zhou Xiong, they suffer a crushing defeatâ€”Huo Qiquan is killed, Zhou Xiong escapes, and a video of Ho Ho-fai kneeling to Zhou Xiong in an attempt to save his mentor goes viral online. Due to this incident, O Division's senior official Shao Feng's promotion is delayed, and overnight, Ho Ho-fai becomes the disgrace of the police force. Nevertheless, he does not give up and is determined to uncover the truth and avenge his mentor. At this time, his wife Cai Zhuoxin, who has been separated from him for a year, returns to Hong Kong from Canada with their son. Ho Ho-fai tries hard to win her back, but Cai Zhuoxin remains indifferent. Just as Ho Ho-fai suspected, Zhou Xiong's mastermindâ€”Louis from the EGM Fund in the United Statesâ€”is plotting an unprecedented financial attack on Hong Kong, aiming to disrupt the prosperity and stability of the international financial center. His evil plan is accidentally discovered by American hacker Gordon and Gordon's girlfriend Li Ke'er. To protect her hometown of Hong Kong, Li Ke'er mails a USB drive containing the EGM financial attack plan to Hong Kong, but is killed for her actions. Gordon rushes to Hong Kong to find the USB drive, while Louis sends his subordinate Anna to hunt him down.

programme.title: News Treasury 2024
programme.desc: As the saying goes, "Today's news is tomorrow's history." With so much news every day, it's hard for everyone to take it all in, let alone look back at history. History is a treasure troveâ€”if we ignore or underestimate it, we might miss out on its riches. The new program "News Treasure Hunt" guides viewers to uncover news gems from this vault. In addition to special features, live broadcasts, and series reports from the past, the show offers never-before-seen precious footage. Audiences will have the chance to revisit events such as Bruce Lee's funeral, the Bank of Po Sang robbery, the Gang of Four trial, the Queen's visit to Hong Kong, taxi strikes, the signing of the Sino-British Joint Declaration, an exclusive interview with Margaret Thatcher, Vietnamese refugees, the death of Governor Youde, Chris Patten's arrival in Hong Kong, the closure of Kai Tak Airport, the passing of Deng Xiaoping, the 1997 Handover Ceremony, the China Airlines Hong Kong crash, and SARS press conferences.

programme.title: Gods Of Honour
programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a 'Fire master' in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHING's third son. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager. When he meets his parents again, he denies them three times. He even returns his flesh to his father and bones to his mother. Although he is resurrected again, he becomes a 'Vegetable'. Arrogant NAR JAR turns into a dummy. Meanwhile, Shang Dynasty emperor ZHOU (CHENG TSE SHING, TIMOTHY) abandons his empire for his mistress TANGIE (WAN PIK HAR, IRENE) and puts the empire in jeopardy. NAR JAR pulls himself together again under his mother and friends' help and fights against ZHOU's army for the civilians.
